attributes.action: Stop lying to the public and tell the truth about the existence of Extraterrestrial Biological Entities and technology.
attributes.additional_details:
(1) Release the truth about Extraterrestrials and technology not a misleading fictitious representation of the truth.

(2) Make propaganda, psychological warfare, and neuro linguistic programming on the public illegal from both Media and Government.

(3) Stop the exploitation of herd mentality and the exploitation of science on the public.

(4) Stop killing our people because of politics and government lies.

(5) Stop the enpoliticianment of humanity and put people first over war.

(6) Remove the governments minority choice and give the people their human right to choose for themselves, give the population their voice back.

(7) Represent the people not what best suits the government at the time.
